document.full_text: members of the commissioner's office were said to have spoken with the yankees and were satisfied that yuri sucart, who was implicated by alex rodriguez as his steroid provider, was not in violation of restrictions that were imposed two years ago.
document.title: yankees say rodriguez's cousin has not violated restrictions
lines_and_colors: members of the commissioner's office were said to have spoken with the yankees and were satisfied that yuri sucart, who was implicated by alex rodriguez as his steroid provider, was not in violation of restrictions that were imposed two years ago.
